title: Vegetable shepherd’s pie
description: This simple, hearty, meat-free shepherd’s pie is packed full of healthy vegetables and lentils. Omit the Worcestershire sauce and Parmesan to make it a hearty vegetarian dinner.This meal provides 416 kcal, 17g protein, 68g carbohydrate (of which 19g sugars), 6g fat (of which 2.5g saturates), 15g fibre and 1.5g salt per portion.
ingredients: 3 sprigs fresh thyme, leaves only, finely chopped
1 x 400g tin green or Puy lentils, drained
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 sweet potatoes (about 500g/1lb 2oz in total), peeled and cut into 2cm/¾in chunks
2 floury potatoes (about 500g/1lb 2oz in total), peeled and cut into 2cm/¾in chunks
½ small cauliflower, leaves and root removed, separated into florets
salt and freshly ground black pepper
